page.title: 19INTERVIEWING AN OLD PERSON
page.content: Royston used to have a big{market}and now it has about 35 stalls.There used to be a cinema opposite the{police {station}but it got burnt down.There is still a{cinema}in town which was at one time a{bingo hall.}The style of {shops}has changed a lot.They used to be houses with a front window display- ing the goods on sale,or some things were hanging outside.Today they have a large glass front and are built just as shops.The High Street used to have cars going along it in both directions but{traffic}is much bigger and heavier now,and it is a one-way street.{Roads} were not tarmaced like today ,instead they were cobbled and bumpy.The{swim- {ming pool}is quite new,and in the old days there weren't Indian or Chinese restaurants.The old Bassett's{sweet {factory}closed down,in its place they have built a{supermarket.
